choices: Zelda, Peach, Samus, Chun Li, Morrigan
1.content:
The ships arrived at the dock. One by one, the occupants stepped off, carrying whatever items they may have had with them. One of them, a Hylian princess with long brown hair, looked around.

         "How curious," Zelda said to her blonde-haired companion, Peach. "It appears that everyone in this tournament is a woman."

         "It's certainly a pleasant change from the other competitions we've been in," the second princess replied. "At least we have a better chance of winning."

         "I wouldn't be so sure about that," came a reply. The two turned around and saw a blue-skinned demoness wearing a tight red outfit. "You two wouldn't even be able to make me flinch," Towa continued.

         "Why am I even here?!" whined Bianca, sulking. "I can't even fight!"

         Before anyone could reply, a booming voice came from a series of speakers. "Welcome, ladies, to the first ever Amazons of Gaming Tournament. I am your host for this event, and you may call me Z. Now, let me explain how this little event shall play out.

         "This island is made up of many different locales and environments, and hidden within each environment is a series of magical items that you need to obtain. There are also items that are meant to help you achieve this goal. The first participant -or participants, if you decide to team up with someone- to successfully obtain ten individual items and bring them to the fortress at the center of the island will win a grand prize of having any wish of their's granted!

         "Now, for fairness, all twenty-five of you will be teleported to a different location. Good luck!"

         Before anyone could do anything, a bright light enveloped them, teleporting them across the island.

         "NOW LET THE AMAZONS OF GAMING TOURNAMENT BEGIN!!!"

Choose your fighter...
1.title: Choose Your Fighter!

11.content:
Choose your fighter...

-Princess Zelda, The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess: The legendary princess of Hyrule, she is the wielder of the Triforce of Wisdom and very gifted with magic.

-Princess Peach, Super Mario Bros. series: The princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, who is known for getting kidnapped by Bowser. She's actually a decent fighter when she defends herself.

-Samus Aran, Metroid series: Armed with the Power Suit, this bounty hunter is a force to be reckoned with, Even if she's forced into her Zero Suit, she's far from defenseless.

-Chun Li, Street Fighter series: The first lady of fighting games, this Interpol agent is best known for her twin pillars of power she calls her legs.

-Morrigan Aensland, Darkstalkers series: This sexy succubus literally thrives on excitement. Male or female, she's always ready for a good time.
11.title: Zelda, Peach, Samus, Chun Li, Morrigan

choices: See what the glowing orb is.
Check one of the side rooms.
She hears someone else! Is it friend or foe?!
111.content:
The Hylian princess looked around, adjusting to the sudden teleportation. It appeared she had been transported to some sort of shrine or temple. Candles and torches lit the interior.

         In the center of the shrine was an altar of some sort, with an orb of glowing gold light resting a foot above it. On either side of the room were wooden doors leading to other rooms. Zelda contemplated what she should do.
111.title: Zelda

choices: The Trophy malfunctions, summoning someone from a different era!
1112.content:
Zelda thought about it, then walked to the nearest wooden door and opened it. Even though she could sense a familiar aura coming from the orb of light, she wanted to check the rest of the shrine, just in case. Who knows, she thought to herself, maybe I'll find something of use.

         The room was lackluster compared to the area with the altar. Simple wooden cabinets lined one of the walls, and a mahogany table stood in the middle of the room, with a cardboard box sitting on it. Raising an eyebrow, the princess walked over to the table and opened the box. Her eyes widened in surprise as she pulled out an Assist Trophy. "Why is this here?" she asked, looking it over. She remembered these strange magical items from the Smash Bros tournaments, but this one seemed different somehow. Looking in the box, she found a note. "Bring forth anyone of your choosing," she read aloud.

         Thinking over it, Zelda held the Assist Trophy out and thought about who she wanted to "bring forth," as the note said. She could summon Link, as he would be a great asset in this tournament. She could also summon Midna, the Twilight Princess herself; surely she could help, now that she was back in her normal form. She thought her choices over.
1112.title: Check one of the side rooms.

11121.content:
After thinking it over, Zelda knew who she wanted to summon. "Alright, Link, I need your help!"

         A bright light filled the room, blinding the princess. After a minute or so, the light faded, revealing a familiar warrior in a green tunic. Zelda gasped in surprise before running over and hugging him.

         A few minutes later, Zelda and Link readied themselves. She had explained the situation to him, and they were ready to continue. "Alright, Link, what should we do next?"
11121.title: She summons Link.

112.content: Peach wandered around a forest, not quite understanding where she was. It was foggy, much too foggy for the princess and she could feel the taunting gaze of something behind her, judging her. She continued to wander, hoping to find where she was and she swore that she'd seen that oddly shaped tree somewhere before. Peach then noticed something gleaming, something in the tree. She reached into the tree's maw, pulling out a polished chest! She opened it, finding a corked vial with an odd blue liquid. On it was a piece of tape reading 'G-11' which peaked curiosity.
112.title: Peach

choices: Samus hears someone coming from behind her
113.content:
Samus Aran blinked as the teleportation took her away from where she was. She was now in what looked to be a jungle. It was hot and muggy. Samus was glad she wasn't wearing her armored suit but her zero suit which showed off her curves.

Samus started to walk down the faint path. After walking for a while she came upon a tree with mushrooms all over it.

"A Mushroom tree... " said Samus faintly

On the top of the tree was the largest mushroom that she ever saw.

Samus then saw a sign nailed to the mushroom tree that read: "Climb me to get the ultra rare Mega Mega Giga Mushroom"

"Ridiculous name" chuckled Samus.

choices: She sees someone! Is it friend or foe?!
114.content:
Chun-Li looked around the sandy beach she had been teleported to. Off in the distance, she could see the ship that had brought the contestants still sitting at the dock, bobbing slowly in the water. Nearby was a small shack, which was clearly suffering from a bit of neglect, the windows either shattered or completely missing and the paint peeling away. Further down the beach was a small boat that appeared to have been washed ashore during a storm. Even from this distance, Chun-Li could tell the vessel was no longer sea-worthy.

         "Well, I guess I don't have much of a choice here. Which should I check out first?"
114.title: Chun-Li

choices: Jonathan is eager to ignore the rules
115.content:
Morrigan looked around to discover that she had been transported to a rocky landscape close to what looked like a volcano. A thin stream of steam was pouring out of the top of the volcano which looked to be only a mile away or so. The sexy succubus also saw a building about half a mile away. Morrigan shrugged and headed towards the building

The building turned out to be a hot spring spa. She entered the building's lobby to discover a sleeping human male at the reception desk.


Morrigan walked over to the sleeping human and cleared her throat very loudly. The human, who had red hair and probably in his early twenties, jerked awake and stared at Morrigan.

"Yes?" Purred Morrigan.

"Er, welcome to our hot springs spa" said the man and Morrigan smiled at the look of utter revelence the man was giving her. She wasn't even flirting and he was obviously turned on. Morrigan has that effect on mortals regardless of gender.

"So this is where I go to get wet?" Purred Morrigan using a sultry bedroom voice that clearly made the man's knees buckle. "What's your name, love?"

"Jonathan"

"Well, Jonathan" said Morrigan. "I just came off the boat and decided I need a nice long soak after such long voyage. Care to join me?"

"We don't have co-ed baths" said Jonathan.

"Really? Well that's too bad" pouted Morrigan. "I guess I just have to get wet all by myself"

131.content:
Aqua blinked as one moment she was at a dock and the next moment she was teleported to what looked like an abandoned building. She appeared to be in a fairly large lobby that had went to complete hell: the floor was strewn with debris of all kinds.

"Well, this is pleasant" said Aqua looking around. There was a sign above the receptionists desk that said in big bold letters

Mount Sanguine Research Center

Aqua raised her eyebrows and decided to walk down the long hallway next to the wide desk. She passed by rooms with unlabeled doors that seemed to be examination rooms. Aqua came upon a closed door that was labeled "Apotheosis Serum Research"

".....Apotheosis Serum?" Asked the blue-haired Keyblade master. Intrigued by this door she opened it to discover a small lab. The lab had just two tables in it; One table had a bunch of scientific equipment on it and the other table had ten vials filled with a reddish liquid. Each vial wasn't labeled at all

"None of these are labeled?" Scoffed Aqua. "That sounds quite irresponsible" Aqua found no other information about the ten vials or what liquid they contained.


It was thirst that convinced Aqua to test out one of the vials. Just a small drink just in case it was poisoned. Aqua picked a vial at random and drank just a sip.
131.title: Aqua

1313.content:
When Aqua drank from the vial of liquid she felt immense power flowing throughout her body. Her mind was a sensory overload as she sensed all the people in the world: their every thought, their every fear. Aqua had only taken a tiny sip but that was enough for the transformation to occur. Her body now radiated a golden light; her hair had turned from blue to pure white and her eyes were depthless. Aqua had dropped the vial in surprise and alarm, shattering it. Aqua stepped back from the table.

"What happened to me?!" yelled Aqua. Her voice had an frightening echo now and it reverberated with power that seemed to make the very air tremble. The lab also dimmed for a second or two then returned to its normal lighting.

It took Aqua another minute to realize a rather startling fact: she was now a goddess. There was no other explanation for how she could sense all the people in the world and what they were thinking.

"Hey, who's in there?" asked a voice. Aqua turned to see that a man in a white lab coat had entered the lab. The man had red hair and a weak chin. He also was wearing glasses. As soon as he looked at her, he immediately bowed down to her. "Oh dear.....You must've drank one of those vials"

"Indeed I have" said Aqua.
"Good thing it's only temporary" said the man. "You're a goddess for twenty-four hours. We've had problems with that particular serum you see...."

"Quit your babbling and tell me who you are' said Aqua.

"I'm Professor Henry Ewell" said the man. "I'm one of the researchers here on this island. I'm only a lowly assistant though"

"So I shall return to normal by tomorrow then?" asked Aqua. Henry nodded

"...how could a simple serum turn me into a God?" asked Aqua.

"That serum was the result of the research of the Hyper Emeralds.....stones of immense power. Bits of the Emerald were contained in the vial you drank, thus giving you temporary godhood"

"Are you saying that these Hyper Emeralds could grant permanent godhood?"

Henry shrugged. "We don't know that much about the Emeralds to be honest.....at least I don't. They're scattered everywhere on the island"

"With this power I could free Ven and Terra from the darkness...." said Aqua.

"That's not entirely correct" said Henry. "The power of the Emeralds only work on this island.....we don't know why or how"

"A handicap then" sighed Aqua. "However....I don't need to leave the island to do that" here, Aqua raised her hand and concentrated. It took Aqua a full minute to do what she was seeking to do. Her eyes opened and smiled.....and that's when she noticed that Henry had leff the room....and he had taken all of the vials with him. She thought about going after him.
1313.title: Temporary Godhood

"I'm actually rather surprised I can't get a signal out to the big guy" in reference to her co-worker, the brilliant Winston (who was also a gorilla!), "or to Em" a cute nickname she used at times when speaking of her girlfriend, Emily "Don't wanna worry either of 'em."

She sighed but true to her nature she didn't allow the worry to get to her, she just had to get out of this forest and win this competition! After that she could get back to her friends in Overwatch and her dear girlfriend who waited at home.

Simply concentrate your thoughts and bring them forth to your aid."

Tifa Lockhart found herself on the beach. On the horizon she could see the dock that she had arrived on this island on. It was warm and the air tasted of salt. Looking around Tifa saw a perquillar looking berry bush on the edge of the beach and the woods beyond. She stepped closer to the bush to look at the polka-dotted berries. The berries were blue and red.

"Those are what we call 'mighty berries'" said a voice behind her. Tifa turned to see a figure dressed in a white robe with gold trimmings. The head was completely obscured by the hood of the robe and the fact that the figure was also wearing a wide-brimmed white hat.

"Who are you?" Asked Tifa.

"That's not important" said White Hat. "Let's just say....I'm invested in your success. Please eat as much of those berries you can find. You won't be disappointed"

Tifa turned back to face the berry bush. She shrugged and decided to eat a few of the berries. When she did so her muscles exploded and thickened. Her biceps grew three times their normal size and her pecs grew too making her already large chest expand even bigger than before. Her legs and abs gained more muscle as well.

"What a rush" said Tifa glancing back to see White Hat but he or she was gone.

The berries were so tasty that Tifa didn't care about the mysterious figure that told her about the berries. Tifa grabbed whole handfuls of the berries and eagerly gobbled them down.

A few minutes later a ten foot tall Tifa stood up. Tifa was bulging with muscle. Her legs were thicker than tree trunks and she was sporting an absolutely impossible 32-pack rock hard abs. Her biceps were at least three feet bigger.

"I feel like a goddess now" said Tifa flexing her impressive muscles. "I'll be totally invincible for this tournament"

choices: Keep some in hand for later
1511.content:
Walking towards another bushel of the mighty berries, deep imprints in the sand left in her wake. Tifa reached down to grab another batch but hesitated, a glance down at what little she could see between her massive pectorals affirmed what little fabric she still possessed.

Blushing slightly at the realisation, Tifa remembered the strange figure’s words to eat as many of the berries as she could find. Her mind once again blissfully remembering the flavour and sensation of the growth they provided. Snapped from her trance she contemplated, keeping some on hand, either for herself or a potential ally might be more useful than eating some right now?
1511.title: Tifa spots another bush of Mighty berries

choices: Yuna heads toward one of the shacks scattered about the area
If she's got the time maybe that boat is worth checking out?
Yuna eyes the bushes of odd plant life nearby
152.content:
The former summoner now treasure hunter had apparently lucked out after she and the rest of the ladies in this odd, to say the least, competition had disappeared in flashes of light she had found herself on a beach not too far away from the dock she had been standing upon.

Yuna smiled at her good fortune but that didn't mean she could allow herself to get careless. She remembered when she and her cousin Rikku trained with fellow Gullwings member Paine, the physically stronger sliver-haired swordswoman told them to never ease on an opponent despite their good intentions even a friendly face may wish to see you defeated and an enemy even more so.

On the way over and standing at the dock Yuna had picked up on some sinister forces among them, reason why she had her guns drawn ready to fire just in case those particular women were nearby and sought to cut her down.

The beach while beautiful and serene was also rather quiet with just the simple sound of the waves spilling onto the sand. Out in the distance she could make out what appeared to be some shacks and was that a wrecked boat just outside the coastline?

She took in a breath a part of her wishing Rikku or at the very least Paine was here with her to face this island trial together but alas they were not nor was her love, Tidus.

"Then again we were told we could team up with another. Maybe if I can find a like-minded friend we can beat this together and get back to our loved ones."

Yuna smiled feeling a sense of deja-vu if she was able to pick up a couple friends along the way to completing the competition.

"Just like old times." She muttered to herself as she continued to walk the beach taking in the surrounding as she did so.
152.title: Yuna

choices: Palutena enters a field of super mushrooms
She walks into the surrounding forest
153.content:
".....Really? You picked ME to get buffed up? If you wanted to see a muscle God, why not pick Heracles? Schwarzenegger? Vin Diesel? Any of the male wrestlers from the WWE? Oh, Mr. Drez, do you think I need to be buffed up?"

.......

"Hey, I'm talking to you!"

You know who I am?

"Of course I do! I'm Palutena, goddess of light! I see all, I know all"

You're not supposed to be talking to me

"Puh-lease! I come from a game that had no fourth wall which makes sense since you're dealing with God's and goddesses alike"

......You gotta point there......so......

"So.....send me somewhere to relax until the grand fight takes place. I need no buffing up for I am a mighty goddess"

What about the beach?

"You say that just to see me in a bikini"

I can't see anything here.....I don't have an all-seeing eye

"Why don't I pull you here so you can gaze upon my beauty?"

Won't I melt in your presence?

"Don't be ridiculous"

I'm not sure self-insertion is allowed here

"Okay, okay. Whatever. I come from a game where you can make an offering to me and you, the player, get absolutely nothing for it save for seeing all my glory"

What does that have to do with anything?

"Teleport me to wherever you want, mortal"

.........fine, whatever

========



The goddess Palutena found herself exactly where she was: at the long pier where the ship was docked. Palutena looked around to see a that nobody was on the pier with her. The sun was directly above and it was a cloudless blue sky.
Palutena walked down the pier, enjoying the feel of the breeze on her.....
"Hey! I am NOT naked!" yelled Palutena to the air.
"I'm not yelling at the air! I'm yelling at YOU, you perverted Author!"
..... Palutena was wearing her usual clothing and shield.....and spear
"That's more like it"
Palutena continued to walk down the pier until she came to an ordinary parking lot that had no cars in it.
"This island has roads?"
......well, roads aren't established yet.....this is still a small story surprisingly enough
"I don't need those...."..started Palutena when a green flash appeared beside her and a pint-sized goddess was suddenly there.
"Typical human scum!" Spat Viridi. "You can't go anywhere without those noisy contraptions that pollute the air"

Now I'm dealing with a genocidal goddess........

"You, zip it!" yelled Viridi. The goddess of nature turned to face Palutena but she was gone!

"Hey! Where'd she go?" yelled Viridi.

I don't know. I just work here. You aren't supposed to be here in the first place. Go hug a tree or ride a tricycle

"Hey! I deserve some respect here! I'm a goddess you little nothing"


So, where did Palutena go?
153.title: Obliterating the Fourth Wall

choices: It's a bag of rare candies!
155.content:
Bianca looked around the cave she had been teleported into. "Aww, man..." she whined. "I'm never gonna win without my Pokemon." Leaning against a wall, she shouted in surprise as the rock disappeared. "What the heck?!"

         The blonde Pokemon trainer looked through the opening. "Hey, a secret room!" The only thing in the small chamber was a large red chest. She went over and opened it.

         "Huh? What is this doing here?!" she exclaimed, pulling out an item.
155.title: Bianca

choices: Was frightened at her new transformation!
Was still hungry, so she went to look for food.
1551.content:
"Hey, are these Rare Candies?" Bianca said, as she pulled out the bag of candies from the large red chest. "Well if they are Rare Candies, then when I get back home my Pokemon are so going to enjoy these!" As Bianca was enjoying the moment however, her stomach started to rumble due to being hungry, and it felt to Bianca like she needed something to eat.

"Well... I hope that the Pokemon don't mind if I just take a quick nibble at one or two rare candies..." Bianca said, opening up a Rare Candy to try to eat. As Bianca ate the candy however, her body started feeling weird. Before she could react, Bianca grew an entire foot in length and her curves have started to grow, with her also gaining a bit of flab and muscle.

Bianca...
1551.title: It's a bag of rare candies!

info.brief_description: 25 of gaming's fiercest ladies are invited to a strange island for a stranger tournament.
info.description:
RULES:
1. You must start out as one of the 25 starting characters.
2. Characters can't die. They'l simply respawn at one of the island's respawn centers.
3. Non-humanoid characters can't grow.
4. No herms, vore, or scat.
5. Only characters that debuted in a video game are allowed.

ITEMS:
-The seven magic items that the contestants need to acquire are called Hyper Emeralds, a variant of the Chaos Emeralds. There are many copies of each gem hidden across the island. It's rumored that holding a single gem fills one with boundless energy...
-The Assist Trophy is different from the one in Super Smash Bros. It can summon anyone from the user's home series, and the user gets to decide who.
-Anyone summoned by the Assist Trophy is allowed to grow, unless they clash with Rule 3.
-The Giga Mushroom is an item bred from Super Mushrooms imported directly from the Mushroom Kingdom. Your height won't be the only thing changing...
-The Rare Candies produced by the scientists at the research lab are way different from their Pokemon counterparts. They haven't been fully tested yet, so there may be different results between users.
-The Triforce of Power is usually wielded by the thief king Ganondorf, but the one in the Shrine of Din hasn't been touched by evil... yet. Its full capabilities are unknown.
-Mighty Berries are an experimental plant being developed by the scientists at the lab. There are bushes scattered around the island.
-Any other items are allowed, but preferably stuff that causes growth.
-Weapons such as guns and swords are nerfed for fairness.

LOCATIONS ON THE ISLAND (will be updated whenever a new area is added to the story):
-Delfino Dock, the only dock on the island. It's on the southern side of the island.
-Diamond Beach, a beautiful stretch of sand near the dock where the adventure begins. The beach has a few neglected shacks scattered about, a shipwrecked boat that the owner of the island is too lazy to remove, and a few bushes of some unknown plant species.
-Mount Sanguine, a rather small mountain near the eastern coast (it only takes a couple hours to reach the top). The peak appears to have been blasted away, leaving a crater large enough to have several buildings.
-Mount Sanguine Research Center, a lab at the top of the mountain where various experiments are performed. This is where many of the items are made.
-Flame Peak, an active volcano on the northern coast. Supposedly magic is used to ensure it doesn't damage anything.
-Close to Flame Peak is an unnamed hot springs spa, run by a man named Jonathan. A great place to relax between fights.
-Shrine of Din, a small temple seemingly built for the goddess of power that's near the northern coast. Whoever this shrine truly is for, their light shines upon the altar.
-Lost Woods, a heavily forested area near the middle of the island. Despite the name, it's rather hard to truly get lost.
-Kolas Jungle, a hot and muggy jungle covering part of the west coast. How is there even a jungle here? SCIENCE!
-Scattered around the island are multiple caves. Maybe there's something hidden within them?
-There are multiple roads and trails connecting the various areas. Scattered along them are huts and cabins where contestants may rest.
-Z's Fortress, located at the very center of the island. Is this the final dungeon, or will there be more adventures to be had?
